description:
You are given an integer n .You can change the position of the digit of the number.
Return `true` if and only if we can do this so that the resulting number is a power of two.

### Example 1 

### Input
```CPP
 n = 1
``` 
### Output 
```CPP 
true
``` 





### Example 2 

### Input
```CPP
n=2
``` 
### Output 
```CPP 
false
``` 


### Constraints:

* 1 <= n <= 109
title: Power of 2
